storyTitle: As Employee, I want to filter my schedule by shift type to focus on relevant work periods

testCases.title: Validate schedule filtering by single shift type
preconditions: Employee account exists and is active in the system
Employee is logged into the application
Employee has multiple shift types scheduled (Morning, Evening, Night)
Schedule section is accessible and contains shift data
Filter options are visible on the schedule page

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Schedule page loads successfully displaying all scheduled shifts with various shift types

steps.action: Locate the shift type filter control on the schedule page
steps.expectedResult: Filter control is visible and displays all available shift type options (Morning, Evening, Night, etc.)

steps.action: Select 'Morning' from the shift type filter options
steps.expectedResult: Filter is applied and schedule view updates within 2 seconds to display only shifts with 'Morning' shift type

steps.action: Verify that only morning shifts are displayed in the schedule view
steps.expectedResult: All displayed shifts are of 'Morning' type, no other shift types are visible

steps.action: Click the 'Clear filter' button or deselect the 'Morning' filter
steps.expectedResult: Filter is removed and full schedule is displayed showing all shift types within 2 seconds

steps.action: Verify that all shift types are now visible in the schedule
steps.expectedResult: Schedule displays all shifts including Morning, Evening, Night, and any other shift types

postconditions: System is ready for next filter operation

testCases.title: Validate schedule filtering by multiple shift types
preconditions: Employee account exists and is active in the system
Employee is logged into the application
Employee has multiple shift types scheduled including Morning, Evening, and Night shifts
Schedule section is accessible and contains shift data
Filter options support multiple selections

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Schedule page loads successfully displaying all scheduled shifts

steps.action: Locate the shift type filter control on the schedule page
steps.expectedResult: Filter control is visible with all available shift type options

steps.action: Select 'Morning' from the shift type filter options
steps.expectedResult: 'Morning' filter is selected and visually indicated as active

steps.action: Additionally select 'Evening' from the shift type filter options while keeping 'Morning' selected
steps.expectedResult: Both 'Morning' and 'Evening' filters are selected and visually indicated as active

steps.action: Observe the schedule view update
steps.expectedResult: Schedule updates within 2 seconds to display only shifts that match either 'Morning' or 'Evening' shift types

steps.action: Verify that displayed shifts include both Morning and Evening shifts
steps.expectedResult: All displayed shifts are either 'Morning' or 'Evening' type, no Night or other shift types are visible

steps.action: Count the total number of shifts displayed and verify against expected count
steps.expectedResult: Total displayed shifts equals the sum of Morning shifts plus Evening shifts

postconditions: Multiple filters remain active on the schedule view
Only Morning and Evening shifts are displayed
System maintains filter state for navigation

testCases.title: Test no matching shifts message
preconditions: Employee account exists and is active in the system
Employee is logged into the application
Employee has scheduled shifts but none of a specific shift type (e.g., no 'Weekend' shifts)
Schedule section is accessible
Filter options include shift types with no scheduled shifts

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Schedule page loads successfully displaying all currently scheduled shifts

steps.action: Identify a shift type that has no scheduled shifts (e.g., 'Weekend' or 'Holiday')
steps.expectedResult: Shift type option is available in the filter but employee has no shifts of this type scheduled

steps.action: Select the shift type filter for which no shifts are scheduled
steps.expectedResult: Filter is applied and schedule view updates within 2 seconds

steps.action: Observe the schedule display area
steps.expectedResult: Schedule area is empty with no shift entries displayed

steps.action: Verify that the system displays the message 'No shifts match the selected filters'
steps.expectedResult: Message 'No shifts match the selected filters' is clearly displayed in the schedule area

steps.action: Clear the filter or select a different shift type with scheduled shifts
steps.expectedResult: Schedule updates to show shifts matching the new filter or full schedule if filter is cleared

postconditions: Filter can be cleared or modified

storyTitle: As Employee, I want to search my schedule by keyword to quickly find specific shifts or notes

testCases.title: Validate schedule search with matching keyword
preconditions: Employee account exists and is active in the system
Employee is logged into the application
Employee has scheduled shifts with notes containing searchable keywords
Schedule section is accessible and contains shift data with notes
Search input field is visible on the schedule page

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Schedule page loads successfully displaying all scheduled shifts with their associated notes

steps.action: Locate the search input field on the schedule page
steps.expectedResult: Search input field is visible and ready for text entry

steps.action: Identify a keyword that exists in one or more shift notes (e.g., 'training', 'meeting', 'urgent')
steps.expectedResult: Keyword is confirmed to exist in at least one shift note in the current schedule

steps.action: Enter the identified keyword into the search input field
steps.expectedResult: Keyword is entered and visible in the search input field

steps.action: Observe the schedule view update as the keyword is entered
steps.expectedResult: Schedule updates dynamically within 2 seconds to display only shifts containing the keyword in their notes

steps.action: Verify that all displayed shifts contain the searched keyword in their notes
steps.expectedResult: All visible shifts have notes that include the searched keyword, shifts without the keyword are hidden

steps.action: Test partial match by entering only part of a word (e.g., 'train' for 'training')
steps.expectedResult: Schedule displays shifts with notes containing words that partially match the search term

steps.action: Test case-insensitive search by entering the keyword in different case (e.g., 'TRAINING', 'Training')
steps.expectedResult: Schedule displays the same results regardless of the case used in the search term

steps.action: Click the clear button or delete all text from the search input field
steps.expectedResult: Search input is cleared and becomes empty

steps.action: Observe the schedule view after clearing the search
steps.expectedResult: Full schedule view is restored within 2 seconds showing all shifts regardless of notes content

postconditions: System is ready for next search operation

testCases.title: Validate schedule search with no matching keyword
preconditions: Employee account exists and is active in the system
Employee is logged into the application
Employee has scheduled shifts with various notes
Schedule section is accessible
Search input field is visible on the schedule page

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Schedule page loads successfully displaying all scheduled shifts

steps.action: Locate the search input field on the schedule page
steps.expectedResult: Search input field is visible and ready for text entry

steps.action: Enter a keyword that does not exist in any shift notes (e.g., 'xyz123', 'nonexistent')
steps.expectedResult: Keyword is entered and visible in the search input field

steps.action: Observe the schedule view update after entering the non-matching keyword
steps.expectedResult: Schedule updates within 2 seconds and the schedule display area becomes empty

steps.action: Verify that the system displays the message 'No matching shifts found'
steps.expectedResult: Message 'No matching shifts found' is clearly displayed in the schedule area

steps.action: Verify that no shift entries are visible in the schedule
steps.expectedResult: Schedule area shows no shift entries, only the 'No matching shifts found' message

steps.action: Clear the search input by clicking the clear button or deleting the text
steps.expectedResult: Search input is cleared and full schedule view is restored showing all shifts

postconditions: System is ready for next search operation
